childItems.name: Scribus
childItems.notes: An open source page layout & publishing tool.

childItems.name: Microsoft Visual Studio Express 2012 for Web
ArcGIS
childItems.notes: A desktop application that enables the creation, maniplulation and analysis of geospatial data.

childItems.name: Google SketchUp 8
childItems.notes: A 3D drawing tool that is now currently known as "SketchUp Make"

childItems.name: USGS/EROS EarthExplorer
childItems.notes: An online utility provided by the U.S. Geological Survey's Earth Resources Observation and Science Center which allows citizens to access to nearly all of the maps they produce and various data sets they collect.

childItems.name: Celtex
childItems.notes: A tool specializing in script writing.

childItems.name: SVN
childItems.notes: The majority of the work I did for Links Technology was managed via SVN. All of my interaction with the systems is handled through the TortoiseSVN client.

childItems.name: Git
childItems.notes: Most of my personal work is version controlled and managed via Bitbucket & GitHub. I generally use a GUI to manage things (currently "SourceTree" but have previously used "GitHub for Windows", "TortoiseGit" & the vanilla Git Gui), but I am capable of working at the command line level to resolve conflicts and other issues.

childItems.name: Absolute Banner Manager XE
childItems.notes: An ad management solution built in ASP

childItems.name: Compass.app
childItems.notes: An automated stylesheet preprocessor that works with the Compass open-source CSS authoring framework.

childItems.name: MAMP
childItems.notes: A local Apache, PHP, and MySQL development enviroment.

childItems.name: Mongoose
childItems.notes: A simple, local web server.
